amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the sale or slaughter of wild free-roaming horses and burros.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record prohibiting the use of funds from being made available for the selling or slaughter of wild free-roaming horses and burros.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 159 (Roll no. 196).
